message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, the price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $650,000. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to sell the product to you for $750,000. Please let me know if this price works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $700,000? This seems like a fair compromise.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider it. I propose to sell the product to you for $725,000. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
